channel.title: How do i make a pk points shop? and d claw problem?
channel.description: im making new pvp area for my server and i want to add a pk point shop so you need kills to buy stuff any ideas on how? zeke will be the shop owner. and could som1 give me the stuff to get d claws on my server with working attack (so it dosent look like im throwing them) and working special? that would be great thanks
